title: [Completed] Unscheduled Maintenance - September 1, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 4 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Community Livestream - Sixth Star Showdown w/ Team Orange Mushroom
content: Join Community Manager EzrabellÂ alongside Team Orange Mushroom from the Sixth Star Showdown event in a Community Livestream!

title: Check Out the August 2023 Art Corner
content: Look at this month's roundup of our favorite fan art!

title: Chaos Vellum Access Temporarily Unavailable
content: We will be temporarily disabling access to Chaos Vellum until further notice.

title: Journey Toward the Sixth Star - Ch. III and Ch. IV
content: It's time to Journey Toward the Sixth Star! Play through the different chapters of the Journey Toward the Sixth Star event and earn some unique rewards.

title: MapleStory Fest 2023 returns on October 14!
content: We are happy to announce that MapleStory Fest is returning for 2023 on Saturday, October 14!
